successes.title: iControlPad 2 - The open source controller
successes.description: Open source controller for any device.

Pledges.description: Your name added to the iCP2 mould, your name (or short name-length message) will be part of the case! It will be on the inside of the back cover, moulded in plastic - if you have pledged for an iControlpad2 we will send you an extra case so you can display/see the names & messages.
Final Special Edition of the original iControlpad.
Please add $12 for shipping (USA/Europe) - $20 rest of the world.
iControlpad2 device, raw version, no box, no USB cable (you probably have one already), just the controller ready to use.
Please add $12 for shipping (USA/Europe) - $20 rest of the world.
iControlpad2 - Boxed edition with USB cable & flip holder for mobile phones.
Please add $12 for shipping (USA/Europe) - $20 rest of the world.
Raspberry Pi pack, same as above but also comes with a USB BT stick so you can use the iControlpad2 with the Pi.
Raspberry Pi ready pack, same as above but also comes with a USB BT stick so you can use the iControlpad2 with your Pi.  Please add $12 for shipping (USA/Europe) - $20 rest of the world.
iControlpad2 Special edition - Wooden presentation box, USB cable, phone holder, numbered, slightly different colour case, with signed letter of thanks from the development team.
Please add $12 for shipping (USA/Europe) - $20 rest of the world.
Developers pre-release iControlpad2 - we will hand build and ship you a unit as soon as possible. Includes USB cable.
Please add $12 for shipping (USA/Europe) - $20 rest of the world.
Special edition of both the original iControlpad and iControlpad2. Original iControlpad is ideal as a second controller.
Presented in wooden case with letter of thanks from the team.
